about.description: Full Stack Developer with a passion for creating modern and efficient web solutions. Specialized in React, TypeScript, Node.js and modern development technologies. Focused on writing clean, performant and scalable code.
about.role: Full Stack Developer specialized in building web products that solve real business problems.
about.problemText: Companies lose money with slow systems, confusing interfaces and manual processes. I build fast, intuitive and automated applications that increase conversions and save time.

project4.title: Oxlyn Software
project4.description: Development studio specialized in scripts and resources for FiveM servers — the leading multiplayer modification platform for GTA V. Our products empower server owners to build unique roleplay experiences, featuring custom job systems, economies, inventories, and mechanics tailored to their communities
